attributes.action: Take rubbish weekly instead of every two weeks
attributes.background: We need are household waste collections to be weekly we are using twice as much household waste as normal due to been at home 247

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Provision of waste collection services is a matter for local councils. You could contact your local council to make this request.

You could also raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
